choose.when: INSERT fingerprint (pos_x, pos_y, uuid, est_x, est_y, k, threshold, building, SSID, method, algorithmVersion) VALUES (#{pos_x}, #{pos_y}, #{uuid}, #{est_x}, #{est_y}, #{k}, #{threshold}, #{building}, #{SSID}, #{method}, #{algorithmVersion})
choose.otherwise: INSERT fingerprint (pos_x, pos_y, uuid, est_x, est_y, k, threshold, building, SSID, method, algorithmVersion, date) VALUES (#{pos_x}, #{pos_y}, #{uuid}, #{est_x}, #{est_y}, #{k}, #{threshold}, #{building}, #{SSID}, #{method}, #{algorithmVersion}, #{date})
